name: Chimera Arena
description:
Created for Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam. The theme was "Joined Together."

Build a chimera and fight your way to the very top in turn based combat!

Don't forget to rate the game in the jam! https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1083340

Credits:

A game by Nick Shockey / flameguy21.

Font used is Barlow Semi Condensed. https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Barlow+Semi+Condensed

Source code: https://github.com/njshockey/ChimeraArenaJam
